It began five days ago. It took the Canucks six months and 79 National Hockey League games to win three straight. They finally made [&#8230;]</description><source>Sports</source><pubDate>Tue, 05 Apr 2016 05:53:40 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.vancouversun.com/cms/binary/11829891.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.vancouversun.com:content=11829168</guid><link>http://www.vancouversun.com/sports/golf/cole+under+masters+boss+payne+plan+same+augusta+national/11829168/story.html</link><title>Cam Cole: Under Masters boss Payne's plan, not the same old Augusta National</title><description>On TV, it will look like your father's Masters Tournament. Canada's Meagan Duhamel and Eric Radford successfully defended their pairs title at the world figure skating championships on Saturday.</description><source>Sports</source><pubDate>Sun, 03 Apr 2016 04:00:02 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.vancouversun.com/cms/binary/11826344.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.vancouversun.com:content=11827160</guid><link>http://www.vancouversun.com/sports/canada+overcomes+problems+take+denmark+world+curling+championship/11827160/story.html</link><title>Canada overcomes problems to take out Denmark at men’s world curling championship</title><description>Kevin Koe removed a buried Danish stone with his last rock to score the winning three in an extra end</description><source>Sports</source><pubDate>Sun, 03 Apr 2016 22:01:29 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.vancouversun.com/cms/binary/11827161.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Canada overcomes problems to take out Denmark at men’s world curling championship" href="http://news.nationalpost.com/sports/canada-overcomes-problems-to-take-out-denmark-at-mens-world-curling-championship" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.vancouversun.com:content=11827230</guid><link>http://www.vancouversun.com/sports/soccer/weber+suffering+from+card+fever/11827230/story.html</link><title>Weber: MLS suffering from red card fever</title><description>&#8220;There&#8217;s just been too many red cards in this league,&#8221; Bruce Arena said after the game. Women&#8217;s hockey seems to be growing, but you can&#8217;t help but wonder if the fan base is becoming confused.</description><source>Sports</source><pubDate>Sun, 03 Apr 2016 17:43:27 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.vancouversun.com/cms/binary/11826961.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.vancouversun.com:content=11821815</guid><link>http://www.vancouversun.com/sports/soccer/whitecaps+keeper+ousted+retroactive+refereeing+think/11821815/story.html</link><title>Whitecaps keeper Ousted on MLS's retroactive refereeing: 'I think it's misplaced'</title><description>Masato Kudo has been suspended for the Whitecaps' match against the L.A. Galaxy on Saturday. His teammate, goalie David Ousted, isn't a fan of MLS's way of retroactively judging referees' calls &#8212; and handing out late discipline.</description><source>Sports</source><pubDate>Fri, 01 Apr 2016 04:44:48 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.vancouversun.com/cms/binary/11821816.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.vancouversun.com:content=11821948</guid><link>http://www.vancouversun.com/sports/hockey/canada+finland+brought+letter/11821948/story.html</link><title>Canada 6 Finland 1: A win brought to you by the letter J</title><description>Brianne Jenner, Rebecca Johnston, Jillian Saulnier and Jennifer Wakefield scored goals in an eight-minute, two-second span in the second period to lead the host squad to a 6-1 triumph.</description><source>Sports</source><pubDate>Fri, 01 Apr 2016 06:44:06 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.vancouversun.com/cms/binary/11821949.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.vancouversun.com:content=11821961</guid><link>http://www.vancouversun.com/sports/hockey/vancouver-canucks/vancouver+canucks+lifted+jannik+hansen/11821961/story.html</link><title>Jannik Hansen's 20th helps Canucks snap nine-game skid versus Sharks</title><description>The last time the Vancouver Canucks snapped a losing streak this long, their record 10-gamer in the fall of 1997, coach Tom Renney was fired anyway. After a win in San Jose.</description><source>Sports</source><pubDate>Fri, 01 Apr 2016 16:57:18 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.vancouversun.com/cms/binary/11821964.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.vancouversun.com:content=11821743</guid><link>http://www.vancouversun.com/sports/hockey/ewen+canadian+goalie+labonte+will+best+shrink/11821743/story.html</link><title>Canadian goalie Labonte will be her own best shrink</title><description>Charline Labonte is working toward becoming a sports psychologist. Her current career, as one of the Canadian women's hockey team's goalies, is providing her a comprehensive case study.</description><source>Sports</source><pubDate>Fri, 01 Apr 2016 05:06:55 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.vancouversun.com/cms/binary/11821732.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.vancouversun.com:content=11821852</guid><link>http://www.vancouversun.com/sports/hockey/vancouver-canucks/macintyre+canucks+hansen+hunts+goal/11821852/story.html</link><title>Canucks' Hansen hits one of those 'nice milestones' with 20th goal of season in win</title><description>SAN JOSE, Calif. &#8212; The Vancouver Canucks&#8217; season is lost. But Jannik Hansen managed Thursday to make his special.</description><source>Sports</source><pubDate>Fri, 01 Apr 2016 17:28:07 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.vancouversun.com/cms/binary/11821853.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.vancouversun.com:content=11820632</guid><link>http://www.vancouversun.com/sports/soccer/five+players+from+world+winning+american+women+team+accuse/11820632/story.html</link><title>Five top players from World Cup-winning American women’s team accuse U.S. Soccer Federation of wage discrimination</title><description>&#8216;The USMNT get paid more just to show up than we get paid to win major championships&#8217;</description><source>Sports</source><pubDate>Thu, 31 Mar 2016 15:29:53 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.vancouversun.com/cms/binary/11820633.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Five top players from World Cup-winning American women’s team accuse U.S. Soccer Federation of wage discrimination" href="http://news.nationalpost.com/sports/soccer/five-top-players-from-world-cup-winning-american-womens-team-accuse-u-s-soccer-federation-of-wage-discrimination" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.vancouversun.com:content=11819059</guid><link>http://www.vancouversun.com/sports/hockey/vancouver+canucks+rookie+jake+virtanen+slapped+with+game/11819059/story.html</link><title>Canucks rookie Jake Virtanen slapped with two-game suspension for 'predatory' hit on Shark</title><description>Rookie Jake Virtanen was suspended for two games Wednesday for what the NHL&#8217;s department of player safety called a late, violent and predatory hit on San Jose Sharks&#8217; defenceman Roman Polak.</description><source>Sports</source><pubDate>Thu, 31 Mar 2016 01:42:33 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.vancouversun.com/cms/binary/11819027.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.vancouversun.com:content=11820953</guid><link>http://www.vancouversun.com/sports/soccer/vancouver+whitecaps+masato+kudo+match+diving/11820953/story.html</link><title>Whitecaps’ Kudo KO’d one match for diving by MLS</title><description>It took five days after the fact, but Vancouver Whitecaps striker Masato Kudo will pay the price for diving, in the eyes of Major League Soccer, in last weekend&#8217;s win over the Houston Dynamo.</description><source>Sports</source><pubDate>Thu, 31 Mar 2016 18:44:59 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.vancouversun.com/cms/binary/11820954.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.vancouversun.com:content=11821353</guid><link>http://www.vancouversun.com/sports/hockey/canucks+game+shark+attack+jannik+hansen+hunts+20th+goal/11821353/story.html</link><title>Canucks Game Day: Shark attack on tap as Jannik Hansen hunts for 20th goal</title><description>SAN JOSE, Calif. &#8212; The Vancouver Canucks&#8217; season is lost. But Jannik Hansen can still save his own. The 30-year-old with lightning feet and thunder hands was on pace a month ago to obliterate the 20-goal barrier and the perception that he would never score as much as he should in the National Hockey League. [&#8230;]</description><source>Sports</source><pubDate>Thu, 31 Mar 2016 22:43:20 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.vancouversun.com/cms/binary/11821354.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item></channel></rss>
